security_audit.summary: This skill is a wrapper for Microsoft's MarkItDown tool. It provides file-to-Markdown conversion with optional AI enhancement via OpenRouter API. All capabilities are documented, purpose-aligned, and follow standard practices. No obfuscation or suspicious behavior detected.

content.user_title: Convert documents to Markdown for AI analysis
content.value_statement: Scientists and researchers need to convert papers, presentations, and data files into LLM-friendly Markdown format. This skill provides automated conversion of 15+ file formats with optional AI-enhanced image descriptions.
actual_capabilities: Convert PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX files to Markdown
Extract text from images using OCR
Generate AI-powered image descriptions via OpenRouter
Batch convert multiple files in parallel
Process audio files with speech transcription
limitations: AI features require OpenRouter API key
Complex PDF layouts may lose formatting
OCR requires Tesseract installation for best results

best_practices: Install markitdown with all features for maximum format support
Use AI enhancement for presentations with charts and diagrams
Organize converted files in separate directories for batch processing
Set OPENROUTER_API_KEY for AI-powered image descriptions
anti_patterns: Converting files without checking dependencies for the format
Processing large PDFs without streaming for memory efficiency
Using AI features without an API key
Ignoring OCR setup for scanned document conversion

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, images, audio, HTML, CSV, JSON, XML, ZIP, EPUB, and YouTube URLs.

faq.question: Do I need an API key?
faq.answer: No for basic conversion. An OpenRouter API key is required only for AI-enhanced image descriptions.

faq.question: Can this convert scanned PDFs?
faq.answer: Yes, with Tesseract OCR installed. Install via brew install tesseract on macOS or apt-get install tesseract-ocr on Linux.

faq.question: Is my data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: Only when using AI features. Files are sent to OpenRouter for image description generation.

faq.question: Why is OCR not working?
faq.answer: Install Tesseract OCR system dependency. On macOS: brew install tesseract. On Ubuntu: sudo apt-get install tesseract-ocr.

faq.question: How does this compare to other converters?
faq.answer: MarkItDown preserves structure, supports 15+ formats, and includes AI enhancement unlike basic converters.
